name: boxes
description: Mutable state containers with time travelling

scripts.build-umd: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && cp assets/preumd.txt dist/boxes.umd.js && cat boxes.js >> dist/boxes.umd.js && sed -i '$d' dist/boxes.umd.js && cat assets/postumd.txt >> dist/boxes.umd.js
scripts.build: npm run build-umd && npm run build-tests

author: Jacobo Tabernero - https://github.com/jacoborus
